div.head: Boundary Demarcation between Madauros and Another Party

div.ab:
Ex auct(oritate)

[Ge]rm(anici) Dacic[i]

leg(atus) [A]ug(usti) [pro pr(aetore)]

div.p: By the authority of the emperor Nerva Trajan Caesar Augustus Germanicus Dacicus, Lucius Minicius Natalis, propraetorian imperial legate (set the boundary) between the Madaurenses and ...
